Name:
CNT_PNS_IRQ_FI
Q
Description:
When set to '1', this bit causes the 'Nonsecure Physical
Timer Event' output to be routed to the FIQ interrupt
request.

Name: CNT_PS_IRQ_FIQ
Description:
When set to '1', this bit causes the 'Secure Physical Timer
Event' output to be routed to the FIQ interrupt request.

Name: CNT_V_IRQ
Description:
When set to '1', this bit causes the 'Virtual Timer Event'
output to be routed to the IRQ interrupt request. Note that
this is overridden by the corresponding FIQ bit: a particular
event may be routed either to the FIQ or IRQ request pin,
not both. If the FIQ bit is set, then the event will be routed to
the FIQ request pin only, irrespective of the state of this bit.

Name: CNT_HP_IRQ
Description:
When set to '1', this bit causes the 'Hypervisor Physical
Timer Event' output to be routed to the IRQ interrupt
request. Note that this is overridden by the corresponding
FIQ bit: a particular event may be routed either to the FIQ or
IRQ request pin, not both. If the FIQ bit is set, then the event
will be routed to the FIQ request pin only, irrespective of the
state of this bit.

Name: CNT_PNS_IRQ
Description:
When set to '1', this bit causes the 'Nonsecure Physical
Timer Event' output to be routed to the IRQ interrupt
request. Note that this is overridden by the corresponding
FIQ bit: a particular event may be routed either to the FIQ or
IRQ request pin, not both. If the FIQ bit is set, then the event
will be routed to the FIQ request pin only, irrespective of the
state of this bit.

Name: CNT_PS_IRQ
Description:
When set to '1', this bit causes the 'Secure Physical Timer
Event' output to be routed to the IRQ interrupt request. Note
that this is overridden by the corresponding FIQ bit: a
particular event may be routed either to the FIQ or IRQ
